Very windy, with a southwest wind around 40 mph, with gusts as high as 60 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 16 to 22 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow showers. The snow could be heavy at times. Some thunder is also possible.  Areas of fog after 3am. Widespread dense freezing fog, mainly before 1am. Low around 18. Very windy, with a southwest wind 45 to 50 mph, with gusts as high as 75 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 13 to 19 inches possible.
